attr.title: Cropsmare!
attr.desc: A Sokoban-like puzzle game inspired by Adventures of Lolo.
attr.inst: You can purchase Cropsmare at: https://mrkdji.itch.io/cropsmare. Download the *cropsmare-linux.zip* version version and extract it, and place the *cropsmare.pck* file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested using the Linux version, but should also work with the Windows version.
